entry.name: Cave entry
entry.description: You entered a small cave. There is an opening to enter it. You have to find the treasure and get out fast!

hallway.name: The long confusing hallway
hallway.description: A dark pathway, with eerie noises and the feeling of pure fear.
hallway.hazard: You cannot move without some light.

armory.name: The armory
armory.description: You have entered a room with several cases of armory left by the ancient people

treasury.name: The Treasury
treasury.description: You have entered a magnificent part of the cave with great treasures, pearls, gold.

kitchen.name: The Kitchen
kitchen.description: You have entered the kitchen, a magical place where you can eat cake!

impasse.name: The impasse
impasse.description: You have entered a crossroads, choose wisely!

box.name: The box
box.description: You have entered a very small dingy room which smells like feces

exit.name: exit
exit.description: Yay! You've made it to an exit.
exit.hazard: You must use the treasure to be able to exit
